content: i love this pattern a quick knit pretty darn easy to memorize pattern & a stash buster to boot our children love their mitts though they have dubbed theirs as power gloves they are great for outdoor chores riding bikes & scooters climbing trees etc where grip is important yet the weather is nipping at their hands i have been making these for over a year for our children gifts & even our etsy shop they have always gotten rave reviews folks have written asking about sale of the *finished product* sure go for it i do ask two things 1 please list me as the designer & 2 please do not sell these on etsy as i have a shop there thank you all for the pattern *love* happy knitting xo
